args.text:
import googlemaps
from datetime import datetime

# Enter your API key here
gmaps = googlemaps.Client(key='YOUR_API_KEY')

# Define the addresses
origin = 'YOUR_ADDRESS'
destination = 'DESTINATION_ADDRESS'

# Define the departure time
now = datetime.now()

# Calculate the distance and travel time
result = gmaps.directions(origin, destination, mode="driving", departure_time=now)
distance = result[0]['legs'][0]['distance']['text']
travel_time = result[0]['legs'][0]['duration']['text']

print("The distance to the hiking trail is:", distance)
print("The travel time to the hiking trail is:", travel_time)
